scripts.build: [ ! -e build ] && mkdir build; cp media/index.html build; [ -e build/media ] && rm -r build/media; cp -r `pwd`/media build/media; cd ../../; ./elation component runjs utils.pack -config janusweb.config -bundle janusweb ui.themes.dark janusweb.client engine.assetworker; mv janusweb.css janusweb.js components/janusweb/build; echo 'Built new release in ./build/'
